sentences.en: Anyone would think you were in love with the girl.
sentences.cn: 谁都会以为你和那个姑娘恋爱了。

sentences.en: did it all for the love of praise.
sentences.cn: 这样做是为了得到赞扬

sentences.en: Dogs love splashing in mud and hippos wallow in it.
sentences.cn: 狗喜欢在泥水洼里扑腾，河马则喜欢在其中打滚撒欢儿。

sentences.en: English has hurt me a thousand times, but I still regard it as my first love.
sentences.cn: 英语伤我千百遍，我待英语如初恋。

sentences.en: for the love of God, get me out of here!.
sentences.cn: 看在上帝的分上，让我离开这里！。

sentences.en: He was the only man she had ever loved.
sentences.cn: 他是她唯一爱过的男人。

sentences.en: His beautifully illustrated book well attested his love of the university.
sentences.cn: 他那本带有精美插图的书见证了他对大学的热爱。

sentences.en: I love you, Tracy.
sentences.cn: 我爱你，特雷西。

sentences.en: I still love you even though I'd like to wring your neck.
sentences.cn: 虽然我想掐死你，但我还是爱你的。

sentences.en: I think he enjoyed keeping our love a secret.
sentences.cn: 我觉得他喜欢和我偷偷摸摸地谈恋爱。

sentences.en: I will return, find you, love you, marry you and live without shame.
sentences.cn: 我会回去，找到你，爱你，娶你，活的光明正大。《赎罪》

sentences.en: I would not do that for love or money.
sentences.cn: 在任何情况下我都不会这样做

sentences.en: If you love life, life will love you back.
sentences.cn: 热爱生活，生活也会厚爱你。

sentences.en: It was an incredible display of motherly love and forgiveness.
sentences.cn: 那是慈母般关爱与宽容的了不起的表现。

sentences.en: Matt is weak and dependent, but you love him all the same.
sentences.cn: 马特软弱无能且依赖性强，但我们照样爱他。

sentences.en: See you soon. Lots of love, Clare.
sentences.cn: 希望很快能见到你。 深爱你的，克莱尔。

sentences.en: She volunteers at the hospital for love.
sentences.cn: 她出于爱心主动要求在医院工作

sentences.en: Tara is madly in love with you.
sentences.cn: 塔拉疯狂地爱着你。

sentences.en: The inscription reads: "To Emma, with love from Harry".
sentences.cn: 题赠写着：“献给爱玛，爱你的哈里”。

sentences.en: Their songs are filled with tales of love gone sour.
sentences.cn: 他们的歌里充斥着变了味的爱情故事。

sentences.en: There's no love lost between them.
sentences.cn: 他们之间只有敌意

sentences.en: they'll not return for love or money.
sentences.cn: 他们无论如何是不会回来了。

sentences.en: Well, I'll take your word for it then, love.
sentences.cn: 唔，那我就信你吧，亲爱的。

sentences.en: What these kids need is love and support.
sentences.cn: 这些孩子需要的是关心和支持。

sentences.en: Working with Ford closely, I fell in love with the cinema.
sentences.cn: 与福特的密切合作开始令我爱上了电影。

sentences.en: You'll never love anyone the way you love your baby.
sentences.cn: 你决不会像疼爱自己的孩子一样疼爱别人。

phrases.tran_cn: 爱上…（fall in love with的过去式）
在任何情况下。经常用在否定句中
为了，出于：为了…的缘故；出于对……的考虑
看在上帝的分上；啊呀；求求你（用于表达厌烦、惊讶或请求）
(英，非正式)看在上帝的分上，务请（表达强烈的请求或沮丧）
n. 爱情故事，恋爱小说
(非正式)无论怎样也不，不管出多大代价也不

phrases.phrase: there's no (或little, not much) love lost between

trans.tran_cn: 热爱，爱情，喜好，心爱的人/物，亲爱的，零分，问候
trans.tran_en: a strong feeling of caring about someone, especially a member of your family or a close friend
to have a strong feeling of  affection  for someone, combined with sexual attraction
to have a strong feeling of  affection  for someone, combined with sexual attraction
to have a strong feeling of  affection  for someone, combined with sexual attraction

trans.tran_cn: 爱， 热爱； 很喜欢
trans.tran_en: to have a strong feeling of  affection  for someone, combined with sexual attraction
